headline: Paycom to Present at Citi’s 2025 Global TMT Conference
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, August 21, 2025--Paycom Software, Inc. ("Paycom") (NYSE: PAYC), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, today announced that the company will present at Citi’s 2025 Global TMT Conference on Sept. 3 in New York City.

headline: More U.S. Companies Plan to Slow Hiring in Second Half of 2025
summary: Twice as many employers as last year say they are planning to pull back on filling jobs, according to a new Conference Board survey.

raw.headline: More U.S. Companies Plan to Slow Hiring in Second Half of 2025
raw.summary: Twice as many employers as last year say they are planning to pull back on filling jobs, according to a new Conference Board survey.

headline: Thoma Bravo Adds Dayforce To Growing Software Portfolio In $12 Billion Deal
summary: Private-equity firm Thoma Bravo agreed to buy Dayforce in a deal valued at $12.3 billion, including debt. Dayforce stock popped earlier this on reports of a deal.

raw.headline: Thoma Bravo Adds Dayforce To Growing Software Portfolio In $12 Billion Deal
raw.summary: Private-equity firm Thoma Bravo agreed to buy Dayforce in a deal valued at $12.3 billion, including debt. Dayforce stock popped earlier this on reports of a deal.

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Paycom Software Stock?
summary: Although Paycom Software has outperformed relative to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a cautious outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Paycom Software: Expecting Continued Growth Acceleration Ahead
summary: Paycom Software's revenue growth, expanding margins, and strong sales momentum signal a transition to growth. Learn more on PAYC stock here.
